title: Scary Moment As Lion Chases After Tourists On A Safari In Karnataka’s Bellary
text:
Scary Moment As Lion Chases After Tourists On A Safari In Karnataka’s Bellary

Scary Moment As Lion Chases After Tourists On A Safari In Karnataka’s Bellary

We all know that lions aren't the fastest animals but they are scary and intimidating nonetheless.

We can only imagine the plight of these tourists at a zoological park in Karnataka when a lion started chasing after the safari car.

YouTube

In the short clip that's doing the rounds on social media, the lion can be seen running after the vehicle in which the tourists were seated. What triggered the lion to do so is unknown.

Reports suggest that the lion attempted to pounce at the vehicle but the driver, as seen in the video, drove at full speed.

The incident took place in Atal Bihari Vajpayee Zoological Park, best known for its tiger and lion safaris.

In a similar incident, a wildlife safari in South Africa turned into a nightmare for some tourists after an angry elephant stormed their jeep. The vehicle filled with Australian tourists then reversed at a really high speed in order to escape the agitated elephant.
description: The incident was recorded on camera and the video has gone viral. The one-minute clip is being circulated across social media and netizens are freaking out, and why not because this is really scary. In the short clip, the lion is seen chasing the vehicle in which the tourists were travelling in the park.
